name: Rockwell Sessions EP ***COMING SOON***
description:
Coming Soon. ***Not Available***

Late 2009, Nothing Ever Stays spent a month at Rockwell Sounds demoing songs and ideas. More Info coming soon.

name: Nothing Ever Stays- Acoustic EP/DVD
description:
The Acoustic EP was an idea that began while playing coffee houses and art galleries on tour in 2007 in between shows on the road.  Experimenting with ideas and wanting to do something different, the band turned to friend and Producer Brian Wallace to take some of the bands previous work off of their Progression EP and Two Years Later and transform them acoustically.

Included is a DVD that was produced, filmed and put together by Nothing Ever Stays. You'll get to see in depth footage of the bands time spent in the studio as well as interviews, live acoustic performances, music video of "The Revenge of Holden Caulfield" unseen tour footage and more! Signed Posters are included as well.

1. We Said Goodbye
2. Doctor
3. The Air We Breathe
4. Dreams Are Not Enough
5. Losing Someone
6. These Strings Will Tell
7. Is this Right?

name: Nothing Ever Stays- Progression Signed
description:
Recorded and Produced by Jeff Schneeweise (Number One Gun) This 7 song EP was originally 5 tracks when it was first independently released in June of 2006, after signing with Regular Music Records in early 2007, Nothing Ever Stays re-released "Progression" in September 2007 with additional acoustic songs "Leave this all behind" and "The Revenge of Holden Caulfield".

1. The Burn
2. Black, White and Red all Over
3. These Strings Will Tell
4. The Revenge of Holden Caulfield
5. Difficult
6. We Said Goodbye
7. Leave This All Behind

name: Two Years Later
description:
Released on November 30, 2004. Nothing Ever Stays' first album, Two Years Later, is a true blast from the past for fans that remember songs like "Messed Up", "Fanatic" and "I wouldn't Change You". 

Featuring 10 tracks:

1. Messed up
2. Out of Reach
3. Dreams are Not Enough
4. Another Night Alone
5. Two Years Later
6. Fanatic
7. Pointless Fights, Sleepless Nights 
8. I Wouldn't Change You
9. In the Meaning of a Letter
10. Never Letting Go
